title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not have the expected behavior of hiding the item in the generated PDF document.
OB: Currently, when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still visible in the generated PDF document.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be hidden and not visible in the generated PDF document.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Use the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none' in the code.
3. Generate a PDF document.
4. Observe that the item is still visible in the generated PDF document, despite the display property being set to 'none'.
